name: No Logo Animation - Tumblr
description: Stops the new logo's rainbow animation! Works for Firefox users too, unlike some other userstyles!

user.name: Herossaumure
user.about: I am gradually learning HTML5 and CSS by making styles and websites. Visit my testing page: Testing Site for HTML (tumblr) Contact me: Herossaumure (tumblr) Herossaumure (reddit)

additional_info: Does what it says on the description. No more flashing rainbow when hovering over the new logo. ----- Install the Declutter Series userstyle to make full advantage of the spare space created by the recent update! Install the No Logo Shadow userstyle to get rid of the logo's dark shadow as well! If there's anything else that needs to be fixed, let me know on Tumblr!
